title: Part of George Washington Parkway closed after crash
text:
A serious crash has closed part of the George Washington Parkway in both directions.

Few details were immediately available. The parkway is closed between Mt. Vernon Highway and Vernon View Drive.

#FORTHUNT GW Parkway between Mt Vernon Hwy and Vernon View Dr, at Stratford Lane, CLOSED each way due to Accident Investigation Work w/Response on scene #vatraffic #dctraffic https://t.co/nb3VFRiL30 — WTOP Traffic (@WTOPtraffic) September 13, 2019

It’s not known how long the road will be closed. Drivers should avoid the area.
description: A serious crash has closed part of the GW Parkway in both directions.
